SELECT count(*) as gatewayCount, (SELECT count(*) as onlieCnt FROM c_gateway LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_upload_status ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_upload_status.c_gateway_id WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_upload_status.status = 1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} and c_gateway_upload_status.interstatus in('0', '1')) as onlineGateWayCount
FROM c_gateway LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_upload_status ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_upload_status.c_gateway_id WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_upload_status.status = 1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}

SELECT count(*) as lightCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM c_client LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client.id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_upload_status ON c_client.id = c_client_upload_status.c_client_id WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_upload_status.status = 1 AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}) as onlineLightCount
FROM c_client LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client.id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_upload_status ON c_client.id = c_client_upload_status.c_client_id WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}

select count(*) as faultnum from ( select d.id from b_client_fault a , c_client d,c_client_attr1 e where a.c_client_id=d.id and a.c_client_id=e.id and a.status='1' and e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_client_id Union all select d.id from b_gateway_fault a , c_gateway d,c_gateway_attr1 e where a.c_gateway_id=d.id and a.c_gateway_id=e.c_gateway_id and a.status='1' and e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_gateway_id
Union ALL
select d.id from b_breaker_fault a , c_breaker d,c_breaker_attr1 e where a.c_breaker_id=d.id and a.c_breaker_id=e.c_breaker_id and a.status='1' and e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_breaker_id
Union ALL select d.id from b_sensor_fault a , c_sensor d,c_sensor_attr1 e where a.c_sensor_id=d.id and a.c_sensor_id=e.c_sensor_id and e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} and a.status='1' GROUP BY a.c_sensor_id
) a

INSERT INTO b_device_fault_statistic(device_type,device_fault_num,tdate,sys_user_id) SELECT B.type,B.cnt,B.nowdate,B.sys_user_id FROM ( SELECT 3 as type ,COUNT(*) as cnt,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as nowdate,sys_user_id FROM ( SELECT a.c_client_id,e.sys_user_id
FROM b_client_fault a, c_client d, c_client_attr1 e WHERE a.c_client_id = d.id AND a.c_client_id = e.c_client_id AND a.STATUS = '1' AND e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_client_id,e.sys_user_id ) A UNION ALL SELECT 1,COUNT(*),CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,sys_user_id FROM ( SELECT a.c_gateway_id,e.sys_user_id FROM b_gateway_fault a, c_gateway d, c_gateway_attr1 e WHERE a.c_gateway_id = d.id AND a.c_gateway_id = e.c_gateway_id AND a.STATUS = '1' AND e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_gateway_id,e.sys_user_id ) A UNION all SELECT 2,COUNT(*),CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,sys_user_id FROM ( SELECT a.c_sensor_id, e.sys_user_id FROM b_sensor_fault a, c_sensor d, c_sensor_attr1 e WHERE a.c_sensor_id = d.id AND a.c_sensor_id = e.c_sensor_id AND a.STATUS = '1' AND e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_sensor_id,e.sys_user_id ) A UNION all SELECT 4,COUNT(*),CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,sys_user_id FROM ( SELECT a.c_breaker_id,e.sys_user_id FROM b_breaker_fault a, c_breaker d, c_breaker_attr1 e WHERE a.c_breaker_id = d.id AND a.c_breaker_id = e.c_breaker_id AND a. STATUS = '1' AND e.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} GROUP BY a.c_breaker_id,e.sys_user_id ) A)B where B.cnt>0
